amendment.description: An amendment numbered 34 printed in Part B of House Report 118-30 to add to sec. 20305 an exception for certain actions under the Defense Production Act.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to add to Sec. 20305, an exception for certain actions under the Defense Production Act of 1950.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 201 - 230 (Roll no. 178).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Perry.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 201 - 230 (Roll no. 178).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
